name: (Fanmade, Prototype) Whiteday Blood Festival
description:
This Game is Very short, Unofficial Fan made prototype. (It takes like 5 minutes to play) Every resources are extracted from original Whiteday 2001 game.

공식 화이트데이가 아닌 팬메이드 파일이며 판매용이 아닙니다. 모든 리소스는 2001년 화이트데이에서 추출해 사용했습니다. 플레이 타임 5분 정도의 매우 짧은 테스트 파일입니다.

Blood Festival is a title of old prototype version of Whiteday, started to develop in 1999 but not published. Blood Festival Trailer has different shape compared to 2001 finished version. Early camera walk, early modelings, early logo, etc. I just wanted to bring them in Unity.


Learn more about Blood Festival in WIKIA

Change Log:

Some Camera Filter effects has removed.
